_header: I was an hound and sith an hare
_description: A dialogue between an Englishman and a Scot, a ‘flytyng’ — six lines

AbeSas1.Transcription:
I was ane hund and syne ane hairAnys I fled I fle no mairRocht
                    futtit scot quhat says thowThoue was ane hund and hair salbeAnys thoue
                    fled and ȝett sall fleTalyt tyk haue at the now
AbeSas1.Editions:
Bawcutt,  Priscilla J. 
             “A Miniature Anglo-Scottish Flyting.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 35 [233] (1988): 441-44: 442.
